abomination, τοῖς Αἰγ. πᾶς ποιμήν β. [LXX]; β. τῶν ἐρημώσεων, ἐρημώσεως, of an idol,[LXX+NT]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
abomination, something detestable
an abomination, an abominable thing, detestable thing Mt. 24:15; Mk. 13:14; idolatry with all its pollution, Lk. 16:15; Rev. 17:4, 5; 21:27*
